verses.text: \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Assuerus \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aman, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jews’|strong="H3064"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Mardochai \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* confessed \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* uncle.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w took|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* commanded \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* again \w from|strong="H5493"\w* Aman, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Mardochai. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* Mardochai \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3254"\w* content \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w*, \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* besought \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H3254"\w* orders \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* malice \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Aman \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Agagite|strong="H0091"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w most|strong="H4428"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* devices \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w invented|strong="H4284"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, should \w be|strong="H3254"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* no effect.

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w*, \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* manner \w was|strong="H4428"\w*, held \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* sceptre \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* hand, which \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sign \w of|strong="H4428"\w* clemency: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H0635"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* please \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* favour \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w request|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* disagreeable \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* beseech thee, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w former|strong="H6440"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aman \w the|strong="H3605"\w* traitor \w and|strong="H1121"\w* enemy \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* reversed \w by|strong="H5921"\w* new \w letters|strong="H5612"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w how|strong="H0349"\w* call \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w endure|strong="H3201"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* murdering \w and|strong="H7200"\w* slaughter \w of|strong="H4672"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Assuerus \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* Mardochai \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* Aman’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* gibbet, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* durst \w lay|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*.

\w Write|strong="H3789"\w* ye \w therefore|strong="H0859"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* pleaseth \w you|strong="H0859"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w seal|strong="H2856"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* letters \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* custom, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w* durst gainsay \w the|strong="H0834"\w* letters \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w scribes|strong="H5608"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* secretaries \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* (\w now|strong="H6256"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Siban) \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* letters \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* Mardochai \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* mind, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* twenty-seven \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w India|strong="H1912"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*: \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w according|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w languages|strong="H3956"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* characters, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, \w according|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w could|strong="H5971"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* hear.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* these \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* which \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* posts: \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* all \w the|strong="H7971"\w* provinces, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* prevent \w the|strong="H7971"\w* former \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* new messages.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* orders \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* speak \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w command|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w gather|strong="H6950"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* enemies \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* houses, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w take|strong="H0962"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* revenge \w was|strong="H1931"\w* appointed \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, \w to|strong="H3117"\w* wit, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* thirteenth \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* twelfth \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* content \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w letter|strong="H3791"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w should|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* notified \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* lands \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* subject \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* empire \w of|strong="H3117"\w* king Assuerus, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* ready \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* revenged \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w swift|strong="H7409"\w* posts \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* carrying \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w messages|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w edict|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w hung|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* Susan.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Mardochai \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* palace, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, shone \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w*, \w to|strong="H6440"\w* wit, \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w violet|strong="H8504"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* sky colour, wearing \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w on|strong="H2091"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3830"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* cloak \w of|strong="H4428"\w* silk \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* new light seemed \w to|strong="H1961"\w* rise, \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, honour, \w and|strong="H8057"\w* dancing.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*, \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, whithersoever \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w* \w came|strong="H5060"\w*, \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* wonderful \w rejoicing|strong="H8057"\w*, feasts \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w banquets|strong="H4960"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* keeping holy \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: insomuch \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* religion, \w joined|strong="H5307"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* worship \w and|strong="H0776"\w* ceremonies. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w dread|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.
